content.1: By night on my bed I sought him whom my soul loveth: I sought him, but I found him not.
content.2: I will rise now, and go about the city in the streets, and in the broad ways I will seek him whom my soul loveth: I sought him, but I found him not.
content.3: The watchmen that go about the city found me:
content.5: I charge you, O ye daughters of Jerusalem, by the roes, and by the hinds of the field, that ye stir not up, nor awake
content.9: King Solomon made himself a chariot of the wood of Lebanon.
content.11: Go forth, O ye daughters of Zion, and behold king Solomon with the crown wherewith his mother crowned him in the day of his espousals, and in the day of the gladness of his heart.
